name: Dumbbell (GMTK 2021)
description:
A small physics toy made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.

Should work with any twin stick controller, or alternatively the W, S, Up Arrow and Down Arrow keys on the keyboard.

You control a ship made up of two thrusters joined by a bar (a dumbbell shape). Each thruster can boost up and down independently. The thrusters shoot bullets which you can use to destroy the enemies that spawn periodically.

Unfortunately I had less than a day to work on this since my weekend was pretty busy so there's no sound, music, title screen etc. Sorry!
